name: Glass Wars
description:
Missions, challenges, weapons - all you need to start shooting at glass windows and see how they explode into small pieces. This game will show you new levels of destruction, and you will be right in the middle of it.

You are trapped in room made of glass. All you have is guns, ammo and your reflex. Shoot your way out of your prison by creating chaos, mayhem, noise and glass shards. Your phone is your weapon, so take your device - and start shooting for your freedom!

During the game you will gain experience to unlock amazing challenges. Can you beat them all? Can you reach maximum level? You will get closer with every destroyed piece of glass ;)
